eventDesc: Tech Career Fair focus on helping companies achieve their diversity and inclusivity initiative with more diverse non-traditional candidates
details:
The MIT Sloan Gaming Industry Conference 2023 is a student-led event at MIT Sloan School of Management.

At this year's Gaming Industry Conference, leaders across gaming will come together for engaging dialogues on the current state and future outlook of the gaming industry. Connect with peers and join us for inspirational keynotes, 10 insightful panels, and much more. Speakers include Tim Stuart (CFO at Xbox), Jeremiah Cohn (CMO at CD PROJEKT RED), Nick Tornow (VP of Creator Engineering, Roblox), Catharina Mallet (GM, The Sims at EA), and many more. With over 40 speakers and 200+ attendees, this conference is an incredible opportunity to learn more about and network within the gaming industry.
reviews: The event is very nice and great event by MIT
